item.title: Bernstein v. U.S. Department of State
item.description: Published: December 1996 URL: https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/FSupp/945/1279/1457799/ Abstract: Bernstein v. US Dept. of State, 945 F. Supp. 1279 (N.D. Cal. 1996) case opinion from the US District Court for the Northern District of California

item.title: Deep Dive into Crypto “Exceptional Access” Mandates: Effective or Constitutional—Pick One
item.description: Authors: and Published: August 2015 URL: https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2015/08/deep-dive-crypto-exceptional-access-mandates-effective-or-constitutional-pick-one Abstract: Readers of these pages will be familiar with the debate going on between government officials and technologists around the world about law enforcement’s perceived need to access the content of any and all encrypted communications.[fn]This debate often combines and indeed confuses encryption of…
